note.p: Solicitor and botanist. Practising as a solicitor, 1851. Collected plants on Madeira, 1855–7. Published sets of Madeira ferns and woods. Private tutor, 1881. Specialist for defective speech, 1901. Fellow of the Linnean Society, 1856.
Census returns of England and Wales 1851 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/1501/558/33), 1881 (RG11/255/117/35), 1901 (RG13/204/8/7)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 January 2018)
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1916 (Ancestry.com, accessed 23 January 2018)
